name: Wild Journey: Surviving the Anthropocene
description:
Wild Journey: Surviving the Anthropocene is an interactive game for all ages where players get to live as different animals from around the world. As you search for resources and avoid threats, you will learn how climate change and human influence are impacting these animals and the ecosystems they live in.

Disclaimer: Wild Journey: Surviving the Anthropocene was developed by university students who are passionate about climate change, but not experts in it. The elements of the game were researched to the best of our abilities, but we ask players to remember that we likely made mistakes and did our best to turn reality into an educational, fun learning resource. If you find any scientific mistakes, you can let us know by emailing changesfu@gmail.com
